text.config.cleaner-menus.title: Cleaner Menus - Options
text.config.cleaner-menus.option.addInGa:
Adds the vanilla blur effect to the background of in-game menus.
Note: The intensity of the blur can be set via the vanilla accessibility settings.
text.config.cleaner-menus.option.disable: Removes the darkening of the background of game menus, such as the pause menu.
